text.front:
HYDROBIOL. BULL. 25(2), 105-109 (1991)
LIMNOLOGICAL PERSPECTIVE OF LAKE XOLOTL.~N (MANAGUA):
THE PLALM
SALVADOR MONTENE(3RO-GUILLEN
KEYWORDS: Nicaragua; Xolotl~n; tropical lake; scientific cooperation
ABSTRACT
A general view of Lake Xolotl;in (known also as Lake Managua) and the research carried out during the
Project Limnology Applied to Lake Managua (PLALM) are reported here. A summarized account o? the results,
given in details as seperated papers elsewhere in the same volume, is also presented.
Fig. 1. Geographic localization of lake XolotlAn.
